summary: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.
cast: Anthony Perkins|Vera Miles|Meg Tilly|Robert Loggia|Dennis Franz|Hugh Gillin|Claudia Bryar|Robert Alan Browne|Ben Hartigan|Lee Garlington|Tim Maier|Jill Carroll|Chris Hendrie|Tom Holland|Michael Lomazow|Bob Hilgenberg|Oz Perkins|Ben Frommer|Gene Whittington|Robert Traynor|George Dickerson|Thaddeus Smith|Sheila K. Adams|Victoria Brown|Virginia Gregg|Tom Willett
title: Psicosis II: El regreso de Norman
